document_data.name: Dodo
document_data.location: [[Krynn]]{{Cite book| author =Â Margaret Weis and Tracy Hickman| title = The History of Dragonlance| short_story = | date = 1995| editor = | publisher = TSR, Ltd.| ISBN = 0-7869-0305-8| pages = 146| chapter = }}
document_data.mainbody: '''Dodos''' were a species of small flightless [[bird]]s that were quite common in some areas of the world.
document_data.Ecology:
The good folk of the [[Blade Kingdoms]] and the city-state of [[Sumbria]] were familiar with dodos. These birds were considered to be dull-witted and sometimes the word was used to describe a person lacking intelligence.

Outside of [[Toril]], dodos were considered boringly common domesticated birds.
